title: Can't save my replays!
body:
Ok, so i was trying to save my replay and it said downloading then i went to the folder and it was empty can.
Can someone help me asap?

replies.body: I was trying to save my replays from my match history with the new launcher but i can't, Porocles.

Are you using a third party program to save your replays?  They should automatically add to your documents folder under League of Legends.  Keep in mind that they may expire after a patch. Check out the [Replays Faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips) for more info, and submit any feedback or issues with the system at the[ client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  Thanks for helping test!

oi Porocles, sorry to hijack, but I've reported this a month ago and didn't hear anything from reeto - Kata bot takes blue square as her keystone, not grey X as if she had none. Also she goes exhaust ignite for some reason, as well as Fizz.

I can't do anything about Katarina Bot selecting to play outside the meta.  :P  Honestly, I don't have any information on that.  You'll want to post it on the [bug report boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) if you haven't already for QA teams to review.  Good luck!
